g.title: G
g.text: FOSDEM 2017 large rooms video cabling setup:

a.xlink:title:
speaker microphone receiver
sennheiser ekp avx receiver
DC autonomy: >4h (BA20 battery)
AC autonomy: ∞
phantom auto power on/off

audience microphone receiver
sennheiser ekp avx receiver
DC autonomy: >4h (BA20 battery)
AC autonomy: ∞
phantom auto power on/off

speaker microphone
sennheiser avx me2
esk avx bodypack transmitter
autonomy: 15h (BA30 battery)/11h (2x AA)
Sennheiser HD201 headphones\n3.5mm trs stereo male\nrental budgetcam
